channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: If somehow we could configure AI so it did what humans can't do, at least our civilization might have a way forward if not our species.
item.source:markdown: If somehow we could configure AI so it did what humans can't do, at least our civilization might have a way forward if not our species.

item.description: New Evidence Against Trump to Be Made Public.
item.source:markdown: New Evidence Against Trump to Be Made Public.

item.description: subscriptionListCleanup: A Node app that reads an OPML subscription list, and loops over all the feeds and only passes through the ones that are reachable and parseable. A nice utility to have around.
item.source:markdown: subscriptionListCleanup: A Node app that reads an OPML subscription list, and loops over all the feeds and only passes through the ones that are reachable and parseable. A nice utility to have around.

item.description: Trump v. Washington.
item.source:markdown: Trump v. Washington.

item.description: 2003: What makes a weblog a weblog?
item.source:markdown: 2003: What makes a weblog a weblog?

item.description: Bloggers, here's an idea. When you write a piece you're proud of, end it with a sentence like this: "And that's why I have a blog." It plants a seed, which through repetition and appearing in many places, might help people appreciate the purpose of a blog. We've had a lot of mud slung at us, let's start undoing it.
item.source:markdown: Bloggers, here's an idea. When you write a piece you're proud of, end it with a sentence like this: "And that's why I have a blog." It plants a seed, which through repetition and appearing in many places, might help people appreciate the purpose of a blog. We've had a lot of mud slung at us, let's start undoing it.

item.description: The organization that safeguards the internet’s history is under attack.

item.description: Love to have Cory’s support. RSS is patient. Only 22 years since it took off. It’s always ready to “deshitify” the corporate Silicon Valley disneyfied web.
item.source:markdown: Love to have Cory’s support. RSS is patient. Only 22 years since it took off. It’s always ready to “deshitify” the corporate Silicon Valley disneyfied web.

item.description: A Node package that reads RSS, Atom and RDF feeds and calls back with a simple, consistent JavaScript object. Open source. Written by Dave Winer (me).
item.source:markdown: A Node package that reads RSS, Atom and RDF feeds and calls back with a simple, consistent JavaScript object. Open source. Written by Dave Winer (me).

item.description: Cory Doctorow: RSS basically works like social media should work. Indeed.
item.source:markdown: Cory Doctorow: RSS basically works like social media should work. Indeed.

item.description: How to Connect Your WordPress Site To The Fediverse.
item.source:markdown: How to Connect Your WordPress Site To The Fediverse.

item.description: For people thinking fascism might not be so bad, have a look at this little girl, born in 1938. Her story ends at age 6, thanks to fascism. Think about a child you know and what risks you're taking on their behalf when you vote fascist.
item.source:markdown: For people thinking fascism might not be so bad, have a look at this little girl, born in 1938\. Her story ends at age 6, thanks to fascism. Think about a child you know and what risks you're taking on their behalf when you vote fascist.

item.description: How Digg helped invent the social internet.
item.source:markdown: How Digg helped invent the social internet.

item.description: Never before has a presidential nominee openly suggested turning the military on Americans simply because they oppose his candidacy. With voting underway, Donald Trump has turned to dark vows of retribution.
item.source:markdown: Never before has a presidential nominee openly suggested turning the military on Americans simply because they oppose his candidacy. With voting underway, Donald Trump has turned to dark vows of retribution.

item.description: “As a licensed psychologist, I am writing to express deep concern about the repeated instances of unusual speech patterns, childish insults and lies demonstrated by Donald Trump.”

item.description: Everyone at Fox News knows Trump is lying and they all went to college (I assume) and know enough history to know where this is going, and somehow they are ok with it.
item.source:markdown: Everyone at Fox News knows Trump is lying and they all went to college (I assume) and know enough history to know where this is going, and somehow they are ok with it.

item.description: Historians: He’s a fascist. Political scientists: He’s a fascist. His own aides: He’s a fascist. The NYT: He shows a wistful longing for a bygone era of global politics.
item.source:markdown: Historians: He’s a fascist. Political scientists: He’s a fascist. His own aides: He’s a fascist. The NYT: He shows a wistful longing for a bygone era of global politics.

item.description: All those system have to start agreeing on what a document is, so we can write for the web and not worry about each of their weird limits. That's a form of lock-in, no matter how open they claim to be.
item.source:markdown: All those system have to start agreeing on what a document is, so we can write for the web and not worry about each of their weird limits. That's a form of lock-in, no matter how open they claim to be.

item.description: Must-watch video interview with Trump about "the enemy within."
item.source:markdown: Must-watch video interview with Trump about "the enemy within."

item.description: Highly recommend listening to today's Olbermann podcast. Trump is crossing new lines, using the military against citizens. I have seen the video of a recent interview he did with Fox. His health is seriously failing. This needs to be the top story everywhere, now.
item.source:markdown: Highly recommend listening to today's Olbermann podcast. Trump is crossing new lines, using the military against citizens. I have seen the video of a recent interview he did with Fox. His health is seriously failing. This needs to be the top story everywhere, now.

item.description: 2017: What if TWTR is bought by a Repub? No one listened. They said TWTR's balance sheet wasn't worth anything. Oh yea? It just elected a freaking President of the United States. What is that worth? Twitter wasn't a cash cow it was a tool for overthrowing democracy.
item.source:markdown: 2017: What if TWTR is bought by a Repub? No one listened. They said TWTR's balance sheet wasn't worth anything. Oh yea? It just elected a freaking President of the United States. What is that worth? Twitter wasn't a cash cow it was a tool for overthrowing democracy.
